creditline: The James and Maureen Duffey Endowment for Prints and Drawings
description: sketchy image of young woman at right, eyes down, with a small cat, arching its back, on her head; six men at left, some in shadows, with a torch, startled by young woman and cat
medium: Etching with touches of drypoint on Japanese paper
title: The Black Cat (Le chat noir)
